title: A Tory Tax Gamble? (with Mike Wood MP)
itunes:title: A Tory Tax Gamble? (with Mike Wood MP)
description:
Conservative MP Mike Wood is not happy with the tax rise to pay for social care, but he says the alternative - not doing anything - would be far, far worse. Simon Bottery from health charity The King's Fund tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that the new funding won't be enough to fix the social care system.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
